teilomillet/textpolicy

Reinforcement learning toolkit for text generation on MLX

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • reinforcement learning library for training large language models, supports many RL algorithms, integrates with LLM tools, scales to models with up to 671B parameters
  • Large language model using diffusion for text generation
  • Reinforcement learning framework for language agents
  • AI text generation with local models, chat and story modes, easy setup
  • Trains language models to generate self-edits via reinforcement learning
  • Framework for self-evolving autonomous language agents
  • List of repositories for training LLM agents with reinforcement learning
  • Automate text workflows with custom actions and AI
